h2_title: Where To Use The Loong Scales in Black Myth: Wukong
h3_title: Loong Scale Use: Bitter Lake - Turtle Island
content: After the fight with Kang-Jin Star, walk along the right side of the island to find a statue of a dragon. Getting close will cause it to come alive, allowing you to fight Cyan Loong.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Loong_Scales.md', within the main section titled 'Loong Scales', specifically from the subsection 'Where To Use The Loong Scales in Black Myth: Wukong' and the sub-subsection 'Loong Scale Use: Bitter Lake - Turtle Island'.
The content is as follows:
After the fight with Kang-Jin Star, walk along the right side of the island to find a statue of a dragon. Getting close will cause it to come alive, allowing you to fight Cyan Loong.
